doc.field: Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records
Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records
Series I. Chief of Correspondent Files
Series I. Chief of Correspondent Files

The Chief of Correspondents files contain materials collected by the Time-Life News Service chiefs of correspondents through 1987. The majority of files were created between 1941 and 1987. Included in this series are payroll forms, employment applications, resumes and CVs, clippings, invitations, guests lists, dispatches, translated articles, benefits summary sheets, annual reports, awards ceremony pamphlets, requisition forms, biographical summaries, press releases, conflict of interest and employment policies, department heads lists, error reports, evaluation guidelines, meeting transcripts, photos, negatives, contact lists, prospectuses, lists of Time Inc. board members, news bureau surveys and results, distribution lists, financial statements and reports, seating lists and charts for meetings and luncheons, vacation schedules, query sheets, lists of bureau staff, immigration and visa forms, reports on newstour participants, background research reports for newstours, reports on the public's attitudes toward Time, and memorandums and correspondence.
